snippet.title: Monster Hunter Wilds - Free Title Update 1
snippet.description:
Monster Hunter Wilds Free Title Update 1 drops on April 3, 2025! 
 
🦊 Mizutsune
❕ Zoh Shia hunt & gear
🎉 The Grand Hub
⚡ Arch-Tempered Rey Dau
🌸 Festival of Accord: Blossomdance
 
The hunt continues in May with another update, bringing a collaboration with a Capcom series, plus other additional features. 

And in Free Title Update 2 this summer, a long-awaited monster re-emerges...

Buy now:
https://www.monsterhunter.com/wilds/en-us/product/

Official website:
https://www.monsterhunter.com/wilds/en-us/

-------
About Monster Hunter Wilds
Monster Hunter Wilds is the next generation of the acclaimed Monster Hunter series.

You are a monster hunter, protecting the balance of the ecosystem and hunting monsters in a world with dynamic, ever-changing environments. Use the resources you gain from hunts to craft ever more powerful weapons and armor in your quest to unravel the mysteries of the new lands.

Experience the most evolved action and improved immersion in the series in Monster Hunter Wilds, available now on PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC/Steam!

Japanese https://youtu.be/0pZDcFTVEoo
French https://youtu.be/xbJRmn9ZIng
Italian https://youtu.be/SqC-_df9cqo
German https://youtu.be/1CLDPV_2Twg
Spanish https://youtu.be/egJT9leE_PU
Polish https://youtu.be/Qj8cKmgrTMY
Brazilian Portuguese https://youtu.be/eRSNaJCcICE
Traditional Chinese https://youtu.be/VLTBp-AnEBk
Simplified Chinese https://youtu.be/T6cHFA5JmbM
Korean https://youtu.be/oEZNn1mIBok
